trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around July 25th 2012
Summary: ESPN 2 During All Star Soccer fireworks shot.
divs: Sighting DetailsWatching MLS ALL STAR Game in Philadelphia on ESPN2 at halftime there was a held TV shot of fireworks and an object cruised at medium rapid pace horizontally across the screen under the exploding fireworks. It was not a part of the fireworks show. No lights on object. Pull the tape and review. Near PHL airport but this was not an aircraft or helicopter.
